# HUD::SET_FAKE_SPECTATOR_MODE

## Summary
Set a fake spectator mode to allow multiplayer name tags to be displayed at far distances

## Parameters
* **BOOL** value

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Setter for GET_FAKE_SPECTATOR_MODE
